parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.09

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts the supplied Unicode string to all uppercase characters. If the string doesn't have characters with [[toArray | codes > 255]], you could benefit from faster conversion using [[toUpperANSI]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''toUpper''' string

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> string: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[toUpper]] "AaBb1"; // returns "AABB1"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[toString]], [[toArray]], [[toLower]], [[toFixed]], [[toLowerANSI]], [[toUpperANSI]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
